SUB_W12_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text: Oh my days! Everyone is frozen!

SUB_W12_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W12_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
This world is called Grelon,
and it certainly isn't supposed
to be like this! Frozen... Heh. Rather like your heart,
I suppose. I wonder what happened here?

SUB_W12_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Are ye suggesting my heart is frozen
in the same manner as this world?

SUB_W12_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W12_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Sorry, was that not obvious? Yes, my dear,
that's exactly what I'm suggesting.
Oh, but I do hope you can thaw it soon!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh wow, ma'am! You're not frozen!
Boy, am I ever glad to see you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_01.text:
I was just thinking the same thing.
Are ye from this world, then?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_02.text:
I sure am, ma'am! My name's Alexandre.
Are you visiting?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Aye. My serial number is D05-72314,
but I'm called Songstress Diva No. 5.
What happened to this world, then?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_04.text:
I wish I knew. Everything was normal when I went
down into the mine this morning, but when I came
back up? Boom! Everything was frozen solid.
I figure it's because of the curse, but...

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh, right. You wouldn't know about that, huh?
So, there was this emperor a long time ago.
He died cursing the people of Grelon, saying he'd
eventually freeze them right down to their hearts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_06.text:
I guess 'eventually' turned out
to be today.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_07.text:
I cannae see any evidence of a curse here.
Also, if that's true, why aren't ye frozen?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I have no idea why I'm not frozen,
Miss Diva! I swear I didn't do anything! The only thing I can think of is that
maybe it has something to do with
these matches I brought into the mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_09.text:
Their light is supposed to ward off evil,
so maybe they kept me from freezing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_10.text:
In that case, ye may be able to use
them to thaw these frozen people.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Hey, that's a good idea! Will you come
with me while I try to unfreeze people?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_12.text:
If ye think I might be of service,
I'd be glad to lend a hand.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_14.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_14.text:
Incidentally, love, do ye happen
to know what a heart is?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_15.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_15.text:
You mean metaphorically, right? Naw, I don't
know anything about philosophical stuff.
But maybe one of the frozen people would?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_01.text:
I was just thinking the same thing:
With everyone frozen, I worried I
would find myself all alone here. Well, my serial number is D05-72314,
but I'm known as Songstress
Diva No. 5. Are ye from this world?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_02.text:
I sure am, although I have no idea what's going
on at the moment. Everything was normal when I
went down in the mine this morning, but when I
came back up? Boom! Everything was frozen.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_04.text:
I don't know anything about your heart.
All I know is that everyone is frozen and
I don't know how to save them—and
that's all I can worry about right now!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_07.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_07.text:
So after we end the emperor's curse,
I should be able to find my heart!
...Not that it will be anywhere near
so simple as all that, I fear. Do ye know anything else that may
help us, love? Anything at all?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.text:
With everyone frozen, my search will be
slow going indeed—but I don't know how
to even begin rescuing these poor people!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_11.text:
Well, if we can't save them on our own,
maybe you and me could figure out
how to do it together?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_12.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_12.text:
Aye, if you think I could help,
I'm happy to come along and try.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_14.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_14.text:
Incidentally, love, I'm here in search of my
heart. Do ye know anything about that?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_03.text:
If ye are the only one who's not frozen,
could ye perhaps be the cause?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_04.text:
What? No! I didn't do anything, I swear!
It has to be because of the curse! Oh, right. You wouldn't know about that, huh?
So there's an emperor from a long time ago who
died cursing the people of Grelon, saying he'd
eventually freeze 'em right down to their hearts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_05.text:
I'm guessing this is all happening because
of the curse—and that the reason I'm not
frozen is because of these matches.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_07.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_07.text: And where did ye find those matches?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_08.text:
I... Oh, weird! I don't know who gave them to me!
I found them in my pocket this morning, which is
why I decided to go into the mine, but everything
before that is a blank.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.text:
Is someone trying to manipulate this
situation by giving him the matches?
There's more to this than it seems...

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_10.text:
If ye use those matches, ye may be able to
thaw the frozen people. But there's also a
strong possibility this is all part of a clever
trap that's been laid out for us.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_11.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_11.text: Are ye willing to take that risk?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_12.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_12.text:
I don't care if it's a trap, ma'am!
I'm going to save everyone!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_14.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_14.text:
Incidentally, love, I'm here in search of my
heart. Do ye know anything about that?

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_800_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_800_00.text:
I've only got eight matches left, which is
probably not enough to save everyone.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_00.text:
We've already used half the matches.
There's only four left.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_01.text: Then we can only save four more people.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_00.text: We've only got one match left.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_01.text:
Which means we've an important
choice ahead of us.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_00.text:
That was the last match.
We can't save anyone else.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_01.text:
I apologize for not being more help, love.
Such things are simply beyond my programming.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Don't say that, ma'am! We'll figure out
some way to save them—I know we will!
Just please don't ask me to do it alone!

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_03.text:
If we are able to save them all,
I may yet find my heart...

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_05.text: Nae, it's time to leave this world.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_06.text:
There is one thing that intrigues me:
Everyone's dreams involved the so-called
'final emperor' in some way. Who was he?

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_07.text:
They say he cast the last rays of light upon
an empire standing on the brink of collapse.
He ended up confined in his palace when his
people rebelled, and then the empire crumbled.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_09.text:
I feel we should gather all the data
we can about the final emperor,
so let's pop over to his palace.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_10.text: Thank you so much, Miss Diva.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Why are ye thanking me already, love?
We've not managed to save everyone yet.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_13.text: I hope this was the right choice.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_01.text:
We don't have enough information about the
final emperor to solve this freezing incident,
and my database lacks any pertinent data.
I'm sorry I cannae be of more use, love.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm unsure how to go about searching for
my heart in such a world; I suspect this
is also connected to the final emperor.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_04.text: But I cannae leave Alexandre alone.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_05.text: There's nothing more I can do.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_06.text:
We need to gather more data about the
final emperor. Do ye know where to start?

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_07.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_07.text:
Thank you, Miss Diva—and I'd start with
the palace where the final emperor was
sealed away. It's up on that hill there.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_08.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_08.text: Then let's go pay it a visit!

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_03.text: Is there more I can do here?

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_05.text: Nae, I've done all I can.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_06.text:
If I'm to be of any use to ye,
we'll need to start by gathering
more data about the final emperor.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_07.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_07.text:
Thank you, Miss Diva—and I'd start with
the palace where the final emperor was
sealed away. It's up on that hill there.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_00.text:
That was the last of the matches.
We can't save anyone else.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_01.text:
There are still avenues
we can explore, love.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_03.text:
If ye really want to give up,
I cannae stop ye.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_04.text: But there's nothing else I can do!

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Everyone's dreams involved this
'final emperor,' aye? Who was he?

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_06.text:
They say he cast the last rays of light upon
an empire standing on the brink of collapse.
He ended up confined in his palace when his
people rebelled, and then the empire crumbled.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_07.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_07.text: And is that his palace there?

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_08.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_08.text:
If so, let's go there and investigate;
I need more data about the final emperor.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_09.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_09.text:
You're right, Miss Diva.
We can't lose hope yet.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_10.text:
Hope is not a quality robots
typically possess, love.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_11.text:
Well I'll keep working hard at this
and not give up anyway. Thank you.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_12.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_12.text:
I am sorry I cannae be
of more help to ye.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_01.text:
There are still avenues
we can explore, love.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_05.text:
According to my calculations, there is a
98 percent chance the final emperor is
involved with this incident. We need to
gather more information about him.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_06.text:
You're right, Miss Diva! If we do that,
we might be able to save everyone! And, um, I'm sorry for giving up.
I shouldn't have done that.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_08.text:
The final emperor's palace is on top
of that hill. Let's go!

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_210_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MATCHES_210_CUT_000_01.text:
If ye were to quit now, Alexandre, the plans
of whoever engineered all of this would end
in failure—which may be for the best.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, that's Leia! Leia! Hey, Leia!
LEIA, CAN YOU HEAR ME!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_010.text: Do ye know this person, then?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_020.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, Leia is wonderful! She's a scholar
on a survey team who knows all sorts
of fascinating stories about the past.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_030.text:
If she's that impressive, she may know
the reason the world froze over.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_040.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm going to use a match to save her.
Are you ready?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Aye, and please just call me Diva.
Now then, Leia, do ye happen to know
what caused the world to freeze over?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Sadly, I have no idea—though perhaps we
could learn more from the other people
young Alexandre frees from the ice.
Would you be willing to help with this?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Aye, I'd be chuffed to do so.
It may lead to what I seek, after all.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_190.text: And what do you seek, exactly? If it's something I can help with, I'll tell you whatever I know.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: Hello, Alexandre. What brings you to Duvall?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
The library. We're hoping to do
some research on ancient symbols.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: How scholarly of you! Well, I know you could learn a great deal about them from Nicolas Flamel's Encyclopaedia Alchemica, but I fear it is an extremely dangerous book. Its most important page is protected by mighty guardian beasts charged with keeping its secrets; even Leia from the survey team has decided not to attempt it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
Oh dear. Sounds like we'll need to
be slaying some wee beasties.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
In that case, I'll go prepare our
sturdiest room for you. Good luck.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
Powerful magic has been cast
on this page.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
The text says not to touch it, Miss Diva.
So, um, are you sure you want to?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
I'm a mech; if broken, I can be repaired.
But ye should wait someplace safe, love.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: This appears to be the seal of thawing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
I don't think we have enough artifacts
to make this shape.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: Then we must find more artifacts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text: Boy, this slope sure is steep...

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I sense an elevated heart rate and tensed
muscles, love. Have ye never skied before?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Look, don't tease me about it, okay!?
I have to look good for Morgane!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
And why is that, love? Please explain
your reasoning to me in detail.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Ugh! Never mind. Look, here's the thing:
I know we have to fail here, but I actually
want to succeed and impress Morgane.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
That specter must have wanted
to guide us to it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I suppose—but I still don't understand
why it would only come out if we failed
at a skiing challenge.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
It is indeed a mystery; I can find no
similar precedents in my database.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I did it! I actually pulled it off!
Morgane is going to think I'm SO cool!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Aye, love, those were some
simply brilliant turns!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Oh nuts! We were supposed to fail!
It felt so good on the slopes that
I completely forgot!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text:
I estimate a 30 percent chance of
a fiend encounter in this old mine,
but think we should search it anyway.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text: I'm counting on you, Miss Diva!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text:
My sensors have detected the presence
of an artifact somewhere nearby.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Help! Fiends! Fiends appeared out
of nowhere and tore my fields apart!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Wow, that's terrible. Do you think it's
related to the curse of the final emperor?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
I don't know, but we cannae
ignore the possibility.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: Well, Alexandre! You saved me again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: Chuffed to see ye safe, love.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
I can't offer much in thanks, but you can
take anything you like from the windmill.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
I detect wheat flour, wheat flour,
and additional wheat flour.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
There's nothing here we could...
Wait, hold on.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Isn't this an artifact?
What's it even doing here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Guillaume told us we could take
whatever we liked from here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
This may hold some importance
to Guillaume.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Have you heard about any ancient artifacts
being found in this mine, Esperance?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
This is a mine, not an archaeological site.
Also, the other mines are still frozen,
and I have my hands VERY full dealing
with all of them at the moment. Now perhaps you can go unfreeze those
other mines and stop pestering me with
all of these inane questions?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Why did ye scold Alexandre for that when the
lad's doing everything in his power to save
people under challenging circumstances? I've actually been documenting his
efforts, if ye care to see them.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Yes, I suppose he did save my life... My apologies, Alexandre. I've been terribly
busy trying to find out what's going on in
the other mines, and I fear it's left my
temper rather frayed.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
In that case, we'll check them out for you!
If I see anything out of the ordinary,
I'll come let you know right away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
That would be a huge help.
Thank you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text: Do be careful out there, all right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text:
I don't detect the presence
of an artifact in this mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text:
But there's still a chance one's here,
right? C'mon, let's search anyway!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text:
Guess I shouldn't have figured
it would come so easy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text: Why did ye agree to collect firewood?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Because this could also be
connected to the artifacts!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Then allow me to handle the
heavy lifting, at least.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text:
There was not a single
artifact to be found.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text: I know. Also, this wood was really heavy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text: That's fine, love. I'm a mech.

SUB_W12_GIMK_DIVA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_GIMK_DIVA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: Hang on, I think an artifact just fell out! So Virgile really did see one in the woods!

SUB_W12_GIMK_DIVA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_GIMK_DIVA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text:
Virgile did not recall this artifact;
perhaps it's best it remains that way.

SUB_W12_GIMK_DIVA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_GIMK_DIVA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text:
This belongs to Virgile, and we cannae
simply nick it from him without asking.

SUB_W12_GIMK_DIVA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_GIMK_DIVA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: I was thinking the same thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Oh, but this inscription is ancient!
Let's compare the translation to
the version etched in this rock.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Hmm, let me see... 'When the divine sword
was sealed in ice by the devil's power,
God used the might of spring light to...' Sorry, Miss Diva, but the word for 'melt'
has disappeared from the translation.
I think someone actually erased it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Oh, that's fine, love; I scanned the rock,
and the inscription itself is not altered. The character corresponding to the missing
part of the translation is this symbol here.
Therefore, this must mean 'melt.'

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
I don't think we have enough
artifacts to make this shape.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Aye, then let's go find
the remaining artifacts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_00.text: These are the ruins of a bathhouse.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Hmm... The words being used are really old,
so I'm not entirely sure, but I think it says
something like, 'These baths should all freeze!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_04.text:
I've heard of normal baths and hot baths,
but never freezing baths.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Unfortunately, there doesn't
seem to be an artifact here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.text: These are the ruins of a watchtower.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hmm... It's really old language, so I'm not
entirely sure, but I think it says something
like, 'Freeze, you creepy peepers!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Ye humans certainly do enjoy
a proper peep.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Unfortunately, there doesn't
seem to be an artifact here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_000.text: These are the ruins of a church.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hmm... The words being used are really old,
so I'm not entirely sure, but I think it says
something like, 'Freeze, church!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_040.text: Even a church has enemies, then?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Unfortunately, there doesn't
seem to be an artifact here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_000.text: This is one of those artifacts, isn't it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
We'll need more artifacts to open the seal,
so let's search elsewhere.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
This should be enough artifacts to open
the seal, so let's return to the palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So this is the palace of
the final emperor, then.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text: Wait, Miss Diva! Thing is, for as long as I can remember, I've heard the palace is cursed and that I should never, ever, ever go in here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
It's all right, love. As I am a mech.
I would sustain only physical damage
even from the most nasty of curses.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
No! That's NOT all right! I mean,
what if you end up getting frozen
solid like everyone else!? Not that it matters, because we're not getting
inside. Those gates won't open, and even though
those walls look climbable, there are other
invisible walls that block you off.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text: There is indeed a seal on these gates.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I sense great power here—everyone who lives
near this place can feel it. That's why we've
been worried all this time that the curse of
the final emperor is real.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Perhaps what ye sense is a heart—which
means my own heart may be just beyond!
I have to find a way to open this seal, love.
Do ye know anything that could help?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Maybe the members of the survey team could
tell us more about the final emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
It's no good, Miss Diva—we can't get through.
The gates won't open, and there are invisible
walls all around. Um, I mean...unless you
know something I don't?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
Aye, this is a strong seal that
indicates great magical power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
We must find a way to open this seal.
Let's see what we can learn from the
members of that survey team, then.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Say, Leia? Do you happen to know how to
open the gates to the final emperor's palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_010.text:
You know as well as I that there's no way inside
that palace. If there was, I'd already be in there
giggling with archaeological delight!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Do ye know anything that could help us
undo the seal, though? Anything at all?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_030.text:
You, Songstress, are no normal traveler
if you can discern the seal in those gates
at a mere glance.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Fair enough. That said, we're not exactly
experts ourselves. Indeed, the knowledge and
techniques involved in commanding this sort of
invisible power have long since been lost to us. All we know is that the pieces of the gates'
seal were scattered and likely discarded.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_060.text:
But several pieces have already
been inserted into the seal.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_070.text:
We believe the adherents of the final emperor
spent a great deal of time assembling the pieces
of that seal. Sadly, this all happened centuries
ago, and the details have been lost to time.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_080.text:
We'd hoped our recent excavation of historical
sites would turn up the rest of the pieces.
Not because we're followers of the final emperor,
mind; it's merely due to scholarly interest.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_100.text:
But those pieces could be anywhere
in Grelon! We'll never find them all!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_110.text:
Allow me to lead the search;
my sensors will serve us well.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_05.text:
As I am not a human of this world,
I wonder if it would be permissible
for me to enter the palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_14.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_14.text:
So there is a key to this palace, then?
If it remains somewhere in this world,
I feel certain I can find it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ROMAIN_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ROMAIN_100_CUT_000_080.text: I'll stop at nothing to protect him.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ROMAIN_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ROMAIN_100_CUT_000_090.text: Nae, that's not within me capabilities.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Huh? Why didn't it work?
What are we missing?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
The problem may not be the artifacts, but the seal.
This shape corresponds to the symbol we saw in the
ruins that means 'freeze,' so perhaps this symbol
is not capable of opening the door.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Um, could we maybe melt it?
If only I still had some matches...

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, but that's brilliant, love!
If we form the symbol for 'melt,'
we should be able to open the seal!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text: Okay, that makes sense—but do you even know the symbol for 'melt'?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Nae, that information is not in my
database. Is there anywhere we
could research the matter locally?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Sure! There's a library in Duvall,
and a museum in Varsailles.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You heard everyone's dreams about the final
emperor, right, Miss Diva? So what do you think?
What's your sense of him now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I could attempt to enumerate my thoughts on
the final emperor's existence, but it would
be useless as a cold pot of tea. Let's just say I found all the dreams
of him to be proper disturbing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I could attempt to enumerate my thoughts on
the final emperor's existence, but it would
be useless as a cold pot of tea. Let's just say I found all the dreams
of him to be simply delightful.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I could attempt to enumerate my thoughts on
the final emperor's existence, but it would
be useless as a cold pot of tea. Let's just say I found all the dreams
of him to be rather inconsistent.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
like there's something awful waiting for us!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
there's something wonderful waiting for us!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
like things are about to get complicated.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
My heart may wait beyond this gate.
Will ye come with me to claim it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text: Leia? What are you doing here!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
I want to go with you to the final emperor's
palace. As a scholar, I have a great desire
to be one of the first to see it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
Well, that's fine with me.
What do you think, Miss Diva?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
We could only benefit from the presence
of a specialist such as yourself.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text: Gabriel? What are you doing here!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
It seems I couldn't put my research behind me
after all; I just can't pass up a chance to
enter the final emperor's palace!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
Well, that's fine with me.
What do you think, Miss Diva?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
We could only benefit from the presence
of a specialist such as yourself.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Alexandre? Was that ye
speaking just now, love?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Long have I sought one who possesses a power such
as yours! Indeed, I am in awe of how effortlessly
you broke the seal that had flummoxed so many for
so long. You have my eternal gratitude.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ye were the final emperor all along?
Why didn't ye tell me this sooner!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
For the moment, I remain merely Alexandre.
But once I reclaim the power sealed away in
the palace, the true emperor shall be reborn!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'm proper confused about what's happening here.
In fact, I cannae find the words to express
my utter surprise and befuddlement!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
All of those sensors, and you still couldn't
figure out who I really was.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Just answer me this, love: Did ye truly
want to save all those poor frozen people
or was that all a lie?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
It was not, Miss Diva—I fully intend
to unfreeze them all, for they are my
most valued subjects. But I have another boon to beg: I would have you
destroy the being sealing away the emperor's
power. Do that for me, and I will tell you of
your missing heart.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I feel a wee bit squeamish about aiding the
final emperor's resurrection, but there's
nae choice if it leads to my heart!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Thank you, Miss Diva. Also, I trust you
prefer me to express my gratitude in
the form of Alexandre?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Are ye Alexandre now, then?
Or the final emperor?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
This is the last time you'll see me in this form.
But should you visit Grelon again, know that you
will be most welcome here—for if anyone can
comprehend my heart, it is you. Farewell.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
I don't think that's true, Alexandre;
I cannae even understand my own heart.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
But farewell then, love.
And farewell to ye, Grelon.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Alexandre? Was that ye
speaking just now, love?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
The Alexandre you knew was a mere phantom
I created to manipulate people into breaking
the seal on my palace—a seal which has now
been very much sundered.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
All my primary functions are operating normally;
I cannae detect any trace of having been hacked.
Therefore, I see no possibility that I was being
manipulated by ye this entire time.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Are you certain? Because now I will arise
to reign forevermore as the eternal emperor.
Do you truly claim this to be an action of
your choosing? That I owe my life to you?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Nae, I'm not equipped with life-giving
functionality. I ask only that ye return
Alexandre to his former self immediately.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Pathetic fool! You misunderstand the extent
of my power, and will pay for your hubris by
becoming a sacrifice in my resurrection rite!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
That should suspend all of the final
emperor's functionality for a while,
and hopefully free everyone frozen.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
But what has become of Alexandre?
And also, where is my heart?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
Aye, perhaps it's best not to ponder such
things too deeply and just take my leave.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Alexandre? Was that ye
speaking just now, love?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Of course! Ye possessed a great deal
of knowledge about the final emperor,
and now I see it's because ye ARE him!
So what happens next, then?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Nothing, Miss Diva. Nothing is what happens.
Why, did you expect me to make some grand 
cackling proclamation about how the empire
will be reborn or the like? No, the legend of the final emperor is long over,
so I'm simply going to take some time and
figure out how to best use this power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: Are you going to unfreeze everyone?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Of course. Well, except for the jerks who pissed
me off—they can stay frozen forever. ...Aaah ha ha! Kidding! Oh my god, your faces!
No, out of respect for all of Alexandre's
hard work, I intend to unfreeze everyone. This is all because of you, Alexandre.
You should be very proud.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
This is... No. None of this feels right.
I'm starting to understand why this place was
sealed away in the first place, and I don't
think we should let the emperor's power out.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: *sigh* Do the two of you know what it means to 'overstep your bounds'? If not, please allow me to teach you right now—but know that the fee for the lesson will be your lives.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text:
...Alexandre? How strange. I was dreaming
I'd acquired the power of the final emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text: It was a dream, Leia. Just a dream.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text:
You posit it was a dream? I'm sorry,
but that just strikes me as daft.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Is it okay to leave things like this?
I mean, Leia doesn't remember anything.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
I no longer sense hostility from her,
but also cannae say if the final emperor's
power has fully dissipated. There is a
non-zero chance he may rise again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
And when that happens, someone will
have to stand and face him.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text: Will that someone be ye, love?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Maybe. I don't know if I'm capable of that,
but I'd certainly try my best.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Ye have great strength, Alexandre.
Perhaps that is what's in your heart.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Alexandre? Was that ye
speaking just now, love?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Of course! Ye possessed a great deal
of knowledge about the final emperor,
and now I see it's because ye ARE him!
So what happens next, then?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Nothing, Miss Diva. Nothing is what happens.
Why, who could possibly believe that the final
emperor might appear in this day and age? But though the empire is naught but an
anachronism at this point, the power here
can still be wielded in the modern day—
and in very modern ways.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text: Are you going to unfreeze everyone?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, that's right. There are still people
trapped in the ice, aren't there? Well, if you wish it, Alexandre, I will restore
them all. Otherwise, they will remain as they
are now. This choice belongs to you alone—
such is the essence of power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
This is... No. None of this feels right.
I'm starting to understand why this place was
sealed away in the first place, and I don't
think we should let the emperor's power out.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
You two are more clever than I thought.
Only a fool would settle for being ruled
by such a power—the wise person chooses
to rule for themselves!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text: I never imagined it would end like this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
That battle was unavoidable, so there's
nae need for ye to feel responsible.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
But is the emperor's power really gone?
Or will it be restored one day?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
I don't know—but if he does rise again,
what do ye intend to do?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
I won't be ruled by that kind of thing.
I'll fight it with everything I have.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
Ye have great strength, Alexandre.
Perhaps that is what's in your heart.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
So you come to me once more, my new sacrificial
lamb. You have been chosen; this monster that was
once hailed as emperor will now use your flesh to gain
a vast new power. And indeed, perhaps I will need to remain in
this land for the rest of time in order to
keep such a monstrous form at bay.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
That form ye bear is the price ye pay for
possessing too much power. But ye've been
given all ye wanted, so keeping that beast
sealed away forever is your duty as emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text: To protect Grelon, I must eliminate the infernal beings who come here from the Conjoined Worlds. This is why I require power—the blame for my actions rests entirely with you and your ilk!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
It was never my intention to bring harm to
this world. How can I convince ye of this?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You can destroy this vile flesh and release
my tormented soul from its sealing duties.
For I am so very weary...

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
But if the soul of the final emperor has
been protecting Grelon this whole time,
who's going to do it when you're gone!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You have wisdom enough to know
the answer to that question.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Now, you infernal being!
Show me the nobility of your soul!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
The soul of the final emperor has been
freed. Now do ye understand the answer
to the question ye posed to him?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
I do. All of us who live in Grelon have to
take on the responsibility of protecting it.
It won't be easy, but it has to be done.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
Proper impressive answer, love!
Ye have my full support.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
Good luck finding your heart, Miss Diva.
And thank you for everything—truly.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
So my new form comes at last. Rejoice, for you
have been chosen! Your body has all I require:
compatibility with my soul, great magical power,
and the charm to inspire others. And now, my vessel, I would have you
offer unto me your flesh!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
It's a trap! Oh, but I never should have
let ye come here, love. Still, nothing for
it now but to buy time for ye to escape.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text: I'll not let you escape this time!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text: I have been expelled from Grelon!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
But my duty is at an end,
and I trust Alexandre is safe now.
Hopefully he'll find a way to thaw
the rest of those poor frozen people.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Who seeks my power? Who has managed to
overcome the trial and enter my palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
So this is the true form of the final emperor.
I sense great power from ye; the people were
right to have ye sealed away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Grant me your power! I beg it of you!
Become one with me, that I might
use your strength to save this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text: No, Leia! That won't save anything!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text: You mustn't judge a book by its cover, Alexandre. Besides, it will be me using this power.... Using it to save the world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
I admire your ambition! Now let us see
if your flesh is as strong as your will.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Nngh... So much...power...
surging through me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
We cannae allow that power to be
unleashed upon this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't do it, Alexandre... I couldn't
handle the power of the final emperor...

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
Oh, do be careful, Alexandre.
The final emperor yet lives.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
Impudent fool! Do you think that was
all of the power I possessed!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text: Have a taste of my TRUE might!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
While I no longer sense a hostile presence,
there's a non-zero chance he may rise again.
I'm so sorry, love.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
No, that's okay. This is our problem now—so
if he does come back, we'll just defeat him.
We can't afford to let anyone be tempted
by that power ever again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
So long as ye remain here, Alexandre,
I believe Grelon will be safe.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
I'm going to become a strong person just
like you, Miss Diva—so thank you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
As ye are only flesh and blood,
do not push yourself too hard!
But ta for now, Alexandre.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Who seeks my power? Who has managed to
overcome the trial and enter my palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
So this is the true form of the final emperor.
I sense great power from ye; the people were
right to have ye sealed away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Grant me your power! I beg it of you!
Become one with me, that I might use
your strength to bring order to this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Power is an ugly thing, Alexandre.
Freedom and kindness are beautiful, yes,
but beautiful things cannot maintain order
in this world. Only force can do that.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
You believe yourself ready for my power?
Good. Let us see if that is truly the case.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Nngh... So much...power...
surging through me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
We cannae allow that power to be
unleashed upon this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_010_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't handle the power of the
final emperor, Alexandre... But you...

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
While I no longer sense a hostile presence,
there's a non-zero chance he may rise again.
I'm so sorry, love.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
The lust for power is what kept the final
emperor alive for so long. That's something
we all have inside us—and something that
isn't ever going to change.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
Perhaps the ambition in his heart
is what brought him back to life.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
Whatever it was, I sure don't like
what it turned him into.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text: Thank you for everything, Miss Diva!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
So my new form comes at last. Rejoice, for you
have been chosen! Your body has all I require:
compatibility with my soul, great magical power,
and the charm to inspire others. And now, my vessel, I would have you
offer unto me your flesh!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Remember well the fiend that haunts this
place, Alexandre. For when this occurs again
someday, I want you to be the one to save
the children of the future.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
As for you, demon, the new form you sought
once before stands before you now.
Come and claim it, if you can!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text: I've no need of senile old fools. Begone!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Do not fear, child.
Soon, you will be mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
And as for you, my otherworldly visitor,
I will brook no interference from your ilk!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
I did not come here to interfere,
but I also won't stand idly by!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Bwaaa ha ha ha! Bold words indeed!
But have you the power to back them up?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
His physical form is gone, but I cannae say for
certain whether his power has fully dissipated.
Should a similar crisis strike this land again,
it will be up to ye to stop it, love.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text: But I can't! I'll never be like Romain!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
Aye, that's true—but ye
also don't need to be.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I wish I was had your confidence,
but...okay. I'll try.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
The curse is broken, and everyone who
was still frozen should now be thawed.
Farewell, Alexandre—and best of luck.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't have done any of this without you,
Miss Diva, so thank you. I'll be praying that
you find the heart you seek.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
So you come to me once more, my new sacrificial
lamb. You have been chosen; this monster that was
once hailed as emperor will now use your flesh to gain
a vast new power. And indeed, perhaps I will need to remain in
this land for the rest of time in order to
keep such a monstrous form at bay.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
I have heard these words before, Alexandre—on
the day my father sent me fleeing from this palace.
And I have spent every day since thinking about
how to release the emperor from his fate.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
It is time to follow in my father's footsteps.
Expel your exhausted self from that body and
claim mine instead! Then empower its flesh so
I might seize command of this world from you!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
I don't understand what you're saying,
Romain! I don't understand at all!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text: Now it is your turn, Alexandre.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
Romain was correct: this is a trap.
But it has not escaped my notice
that he was the one who set it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
Where did I go wrong? All I ever wanted
was to release the final emperor...

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
I am a sinful man. A horror.
There can be no absolution for this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
The final emperor and Romain are both gone.
Did...did I do the wrong thing?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
The fiend that fused with the emperor is
also gone, which means the curse upon this
land is lifted. Oh, but this is just grand!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
...I guess I did, huh? I mean, it really does
feel like a weight's been lifted off me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text: The door's locked. Should we break it down?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I'm sensing the presence of fiends.
Find somewhere to hide, love.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
There are fiends even in the buildings!
We must never lower our guard.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
The fiends are here because of the curse!
Grelon's a peaceful place, I swear!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I still sense fiend activity.
Be careful!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I no longer detect any fiends,
which means we're safe as anything.
Now let's reactivate the cable car.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
We can use this to get to the ski slope
or down to the bottom of the hill!

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text: Miss Diva! The ice is changing!

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Ach, it's becoming a fiend!
I'll intercept it!

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
I've never seen a real-life fiend before!
People said they roam around in caves and mines,
but I always thought those were just stories
made up to scare children.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
This may be related to the
curse of the final emperor.

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.text: Huh!? The ice is turning into a fiend again!

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.text:
Get a new trick, ice fiend? Too bad!
You can't surprise me anymore!

SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_DIVA_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.text: Enough with this ice fiend business!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I'm here seeking my heart.
Do ye know anything about that?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The final emperor of antiquity excelled
at manipulating the hearts of others.
What exactly is your goal here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Morgane
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_020.text:
All I know is that when I discovered
skiing, my heart was born anew.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Eric
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Now there's a thing I've certainly
never come across in the mines!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Virgile
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The locals speak of a beautiful woman who lures
men into the snowy mountains, but I call bullplop
on that—especially the 'beautiful woman' part.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_070.text:
There are many hearts in this world,
but that is not my story to tell.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_080.text:
My father followed his heart to ruin.
Ah, but that was some twenty years ago.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Remi
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_090.text:
I wish I knew—because if a heart has the
power to change my tedious daily existence,
then I would want nothing more!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Our heart is a part of us that
cannot be seen. Yet to some,
it is the most important thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Sandrine
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_MIND_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh, I know all about that...
but I won't be telling YOU!

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
You managed to thaw Grelon's icy curse,
but not your own heart.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Aye. I wish the outcome had been more
favorable, but I'm prepared to continue
my quest in the next world.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Well? Did those matches manage
to thaw your heart any?

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I cannae say—nor am I certain whether
or not me heart has truly been frozen.

SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_020.text:
If it were, you'd need only to thaw it!
Ah, but perhaps it's more complicated.
